Uses of Class
org.ow2.bonita.util.BonitaException

Packages that use BonitaException
org.ow2.bonita.connector.core.desc Contains classes describing connector view (internal use only). 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.exception Contains exception classes thrown by Bonita APIs. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.interceptor Contains classes dealing with Interceptor concept (internal use only). 
org.ow2.bonita.util Contains classes shared by the entire engine. 
 

Uses of BonitaException in org.ow2.bonita.connector.core.desc
 

Subclasses of BonitaException in org.ow2.bonita.connector.core.desc
 class ConnectorDescriptorNotFoundException
           
 

Uses of BonitaException in org.ow2.bonita.facade.exception
 

Subclasses of BonitaException in org.ow2.bonita.facade.exception
 class ActivityDefNotFoundException
          Thrown by methods of the QueryDefinitionAPI when the activity definition is not found.
 class ActivityNotFoundException
          Thrown by methods of QueryDefinitionAPI, QueryRuntimeAPI, RuntimeAPI if the runtime information of the recorded activity is not found.
 class CategoryAlreadyExistsException
          Exception thrown when a category with the same name already exists
 class CategoryNotFoundException
          Exception thrown when a category does not exist
 class DataFieldNotFoundException
          Thrown by methods of the QueryDefinitionAPI if the dataField definition is not found.
 class DeploymentException
          Thrown by the ManagementAPI if a failure during the deployment operation occured.
 class DocumentAlreadyExistsException
          Exception thrown when a document with the same name already exists
 class DocumentationCreationException
          Exception thrown when a document creation fails.
 class DocumentNotFoundException
          Exception thrown when a document is not found in the system
 class EventNotFoundException
           
 class FolderAlreadyExistsException
           
 class GroupAlreadyExistsException
          Exception thrown when a group with the same name and parent already exists
 class GroupNotFoundException
          Exception thrown when no group is found
 class IllegalTaskStateException
          Thrown if a bad state of the task is detected by the methods dedicated to change the state of the task within the RuntimeAPI.
 class InstanceNotFoundException
          Thrown by some methods of the QueryRuntimeAPI and the RuntimeAPI if recorded runtime information for the instance has not been found.
 class MembershipNotFoundException
          Exception thrown when no membership is found
 class MetadataAlreadyExistsException
          Exception thrown when a metadata with the same name already exists
 class MetadataNotFoundException
          Exception thrown when no metadata is found
 class ParticipantNotFoundException
          Thrown by methods of the QueryDefinitionAPI if the definition of the participant has not been found.
 class PrivilegeNotFoundException
          Exception thrown when no privilege is found
 class ProcessNotFoundException
          Thrown by methods of RuntimeAPI or QueryDefinitionAPI if the recorded runtime information of the process has not been found.
 class RoleAlreadyExistsException
          Exception thrown when a role with the same name already exists
 class RoleNotFoundException
          Exception thrown when no role is found
 class RuleAlreadyExistsException
          Exception thrown when a rule with the same name already exists
 class RuleNotFoundException
          Exception thrown when no rule is found
 class TaskNotFoundException
          Thrown by methods of RuntimeAPI or QueryRuntimeAPI if the recorded runtime information of the task has not been found.
 class UnAuthorizedUserException
          Thrown when a user attemps to execute an unauthorized action.
 class UncancellableInstanceException
          Thrown by some methods of ManagementAPI and RuntimeAPI when an instance cannot be cancelled
(for instance: case the instance has a parent instance or the instance has not been found).
 class UndeletableInstanceException
          Thrown by some methods of ManagementAPI and RuntimeAPI when an instance cannot be deleted
(for instance: case the instance has a parent instance or the instance has not been found).
 class UndeletableProcessException
          Thrown by deleteProcessrocess method of the ManagementAPI if processes within the package have still running instances.
 class UserAlreadyExistsException
          Exception thrown when a user with the same username already exists
 class UserNotFoundException
          Exception thrown when no user if found
 class VariableNotFoundException
          This exception is thrown by some methods of QueryRuntimeAPI and RuntimeAPI when the variable is not found.
 

Uses of BonitaException in org.ow2.bonita.facade.interceptor
 

Methods in org.ow2.bonita.facade.interceptor that throw BonitaException
static void InterceptorUtil.manageInvokeExceptionCause(java.lang.reflect.Method m, java.lang.Throwable t)
          Throw the throwable passed if it's an RuntimeException or if it's an exception declared by the method If not, throw nothing and return
